content.text:
# Democratic Republic of the Congo at the 2013 World Championships in Athletics

The Democratic Republic of the Congo competed at the 2013 World Championships in Athletics in Moscow, Russia, from 10–18 August 2013. A team of one athlete was announced to represent the country in the event.
